hints.label: lem-entropy-l1-bound
hints.title: Entropy $L^1$ Bound
hints.raw_directive:
567: **Lemma (Entropy moment bound)**:
568: 
569: :::{prf:lemma} Entropy $L^1$ Bound
570: :label: lem-entropy-l1-bound
571: 
572: For any $\rho, \rho_\infty \in \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$:
573: 
574: $$
575: \int \rho \left|\log \frac{\rho}{\rho_\infty}\right| \le 2 D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + C_{\text{const}}
576: $$
577:
